verses.verse: A Song, a Psalm of the sons of Korah; for the Chief Musician; set to Mahalath Leannoth. Maschil of Heman the Ezrahite. O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation <S%H3444><s%>, I have cried <S%H6817><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and night before thee <S%H3915><s%>.
Let my prayer <S%H8605><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> into thy presence <S%H6440><s%>; Incline <S%H5186><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto my cry <S%H7440><s%>.
For my soul <S%H5315><s%> is full <S%H7646><s%> of troubles <S%H7451><s%>, And my life <S%H2416><s%> draweth nigh <S%H5060><s%> unto Sheol <S%H7585><s%>.
I am reckoned <S%H2803><s%> with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>; I am as a man <S%H1397><s%> that hath no help <S%H353><s%>,

Cast <S%H2670><s%> off among the dead <S%H4191><s%>, Like the slain <S%H2491><s%> that lie <S%H7901><s%> in the grave <S%H6913><s%>, Whom thou rememberest <S%H2142><s%> no more <S%H1504><s%>, And they are cut off from thy hand <S%H3027><s%>.
Thou hast laid <S%H7896><s%> me in the lowest <S%H8482><s%> pit <S%H953><s%>, In dark <S%H4285><s%> places <S%H4688><s%>, in the deeps.
Thy wrath <S%H2534><s%> lieth hard <S%H5564><s%> upon me <S%H6031><s%>, And thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves <S%H4867><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Thou hast put <S%H7368><s%> mine acquaintance <S%H3045><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H7896><s%>; Thou hast made me an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto them <S%H3607><s%>: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth <S%H3318><s%>.

Mine eye <S%H5869><s%> wasteth <S%H1669><s%> away by reason of affliction <S%H6040><s%>: I have called <S%H7121><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> upon thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah; I have spread forth <S%H7849><s%> my hands unto thee <S%H3709><s%>.
Wilt thou show <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%> to the dead <S%H4191><s%>? Shall they that are deceased <S%H7496><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> and praise <S%H3034><s%> thee <S%H5542><s%>? Selah
Shall thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> be declared <S%H5608><s%> in the grave <S%H6913><s%>? Or thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> in Destruction <S%H11><s%>?
Shall thy wonders <S%H6382><s%> be known <S%H3045><s%> in the dark <S%H2822><s%>? And thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of forgetfulness <S%H5388><s%>?
But unto thee <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, have I cried <S%H7768><s%>; And in the morning <S%H1242><s%> shall my prayer <S%H8605><s%> come before thee <S%H6923><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, why castest thou off <S%H2186><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>? Why hidest <S%H5641><s%> thou thy face from me <S%H6440><s%>?
I am afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and ready to die <S%H1478><s%> from my youth <S%H5290><s%> up <S%H5375><s%>: While I suffer thy terrors <S%H367><s%> I am distracted <S%H6323><s%>.
Thy fierce wrath <S%H2740><s%> is gone over <S%H5674><s%> me <S%H1161><s%>; Thy terrors have cut me off <S%H6789><s%>.
They came round about <S%H5437><s%> me like water <S%H4325><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H5362><s%>; They compassed me about together <S%H3162><s%>.
Lover <S%H157><s%> and friend <S%H7453><s%> hast thou put far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H3045><s%>, And mine acquaintance into darkness <S%H4285><s%>.
